title: mris_AA_shrinkwrap
description: This program positions the tessellation of the cortical surface at the white matter surface, then the gray matter surface and generates surface files for these surfaces as well as a 'curvature' file for the cortical thickness, and a surface file which approximates layer IV of the cortical sheet.

omit_self_intersection.title: Omit Self-intersection Flag
omit_self_intersection.description: Omit self-intersection and only generate gray/white surface

create_curvature_area.title: Create Curvature and Area Flag
create_curvature_area.description: Create curvature and area files from white matter surface

average_curvature.title: Average Curvature
average_curvature.description: Average curvature values a specified number of times (default=10)
